Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1201 ORANGE STREET,SUITE 600, WILMINGTON, Delaware, 19801, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: NRX Pharmaceuticals Inc is a clinical-stage, small molecule pharmaceutical company which develops novel therapeutics for the treatment of central nervous system disorders and life-threatening pulmonary diseases. It has announced the commercialization of ZYESAMI (Aviptadil), an application for COVID-related respiratory failure. It is also developing NRX-100/101, the first sequential drug regimen for bipolar depression in patients with acute suicidal ideation and behaviour.
